articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand on Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula Reiterated
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand on Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula Reiterated
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has neither face nor qualification to talk about the nuclear issue of someone. 
					 A spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army said this when answering the question put by KCNA Monday as regards the recent misbehavior of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors over the issue of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 It is the unshakable stand already clarified by the DPRK that it will never show its nuclear weapons unless the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and the latter is completely free from the former's nuclear threat, he added. 
					
					 Citing facts, he assailed the group for groundlessly finding fault with the above-said principled stand of the DPRK.
					
					 All these facts glaringly reveal the treacherous nature of the group blindly following its American master's hostile policy toward the DPRK and ruckus for nuclear threat although it is unaware of the essence and scope of the issue of denuclearizing the peninsula, he noted, and continued:
					
					 By nature, the nuclear issue surfaced on the Korean Peninsula and has been hyped because the puppets secretly introduced lots of nuclear shells to south Korea, pursuant to the U.S. nuclear policy of "neither denying nor admitting," and deployed or designated even striking means for their application. 
					
					 He clarified the following principled stand of the KPA, accusing these traitors of dare saying this or that about the DPRK's just stand and assertion about the nuclear issue while covering up the crimes they have committed against the nation:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors should clearly understand that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is by no means an issue of "dismantling the north's nuclear weapons." 
					
					 The DPRK will never "dismantle its nuclear weapons" unless nukes in south Korea are dismantled to remove the nuclear threat from the U.S.
					
					 The Lee group should not forget that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula should be realized through the verification in the whole peninsula under any circumstances.
					
					 If it is true that there are no nukes in south Korea and no nuclear threat is posed to the DPRK as claimed by the U.S. and the Lee group, there is no reason whatsoever for them not to positively respond to the call for the nuclear verification of the whole of south Korea. 
					
					 The Lee group should know well that the only way of eliminating nukes under the present situation where the hostile relations persist is for those parties concerned that have nukes to opt for nuclear disarmament simultaneously. 
					
					 No one knows when the hostile policy desperately pursued towards the DPRK in disregard of the desire for an end to the state of ceasefire will lead to a nuclear war. It is the height of shamelessness for one belligerent party to urge the other belligerent party to unilaterally dismantle its nuclear weapons under such situation.
					
					 The Lee group should stop acting a disgusting stooge serving its American master after meddling in the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The nuclear weapons of the DPRK with the mission to save the nation and defend the country will discharge to the last their special mission and duty as a precious treasured sword common to the nation as long as the U.S. anti-DPRK nuclear war racket persists in south Korea and in its vicinity and the confrontation with the DPRK is escalated by the Lee group, pursuant to the above-said ruckus.

articles.title: Dancing Party Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party Held
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of servicepersons of the Korean People's Army (KPA) was held in the plaza of the April 25 House of Culture on Sunday to celebrate General Secretary Kim Jong Il's nomination as a candidate for deputy to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Kyok Sik, chief of the KPA General Staff, Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and leading officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and officers and men of the KPA.
					
					 The dancing party began with playing of melody of "Song of General Kim Jong Il".
					
					 Servicepersons presented sea of dances to the tune of such songs as "Soldiers Offer Honor", "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General" and "Fortune of Korea".
					
					 Also songs "Happiness of Being under the Care of Respected Supreme Commander", "The Blue Sky over My Country" and "Arirang of Prosperity" reflecting optimism of the defenders of the country, builders of a rich and powerful country who are demonstrating the matchless spirit with high pride of being soldiers of the illustrious commander were played to whip up the mood of the dancing party.
					
					 Lively dancing to the tune of "Thunder over Jong Il Peak", "Song of Election", and "We Will Defend the Leadership of the Revolution at the Cost of Our Lives" and other songs, all the participants in the party renewed their determination to firmly defend the DPRK with arms under the Songun leadership of the Supreme Commander.

articles.title: Anniversary of Victory of Islamic Revolution in Iran Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Victory of Islamic Revolution in Iran Marked
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting and film show took place at the Chollima Hall of Culture on Feb. 2 to mark the 30th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution in Iran.
					 Present there on invitation were Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					Jong Yong Su, minister of Labour, who is chairman of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Association, addressing the meeting, said that the Iranian people have registered many successes in the efforts to develop economy and improve the standard of the people's living since the victory of revolution, smashing the U.S. hostile moves against Iran.
					
					   President Kim Il Sung paid deep attention to boosting the relations with Iran and laid firm foundation for the bilateral relations of friendship together with Iranian leaders, he said.
					
					 The government and people of Iran have exerted positive efforts to defend the sovereignty of the country, develop the economy and ensure the peace and stability of the region under the leadership of Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic revolution, and Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, president of Iran, he noted.
					
					 He expressed full support and firm solidarity with the principled stand of the government and people of Iran on the nuclear activities for peaceful purposes.
					
					 Morteza Moradian in his speech said that Iran and the DPRK have supported each other in the international arena as they have the same stand.
					
					He said that the Korean people are making energetic endeavors to make a new great leap forward, overcoming difficulties under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Iranian government is paying a special attention to the development of the cooperative relations with the government of the DPRK, he noted, expressing the belief that the Korean people would achieve signal progress in various fields and continue to emerge victorious in the anti-imperialist struggle, adhering to independence and principle.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants watched an Iranian film.

articles.title: New Posters Call for Implementation of New Year's Tasks
articles.content:
New Posters Call for Implementation of New Year's Tasks
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Many posters have of late been published in the DPRK to call up the army and people to the fulfillment of the tasks put forth in the joint New Year editorial.
					 The poster "Demonstrate the dignity and might of Songun Korea with the mental power of the whole army and people!" gives a truthful ideological and artistic depiction of the soldiers and people who have turned out as one man in a general offensive to fling open the gate to a great, prosperous and powerful nation, holding high the torch of a new revolutionary upsurge.
					
					 "World, look the morale of Songun Korea!" vividly shows the unshakable will of the Korean people to build a prosperous socialist country without fail by breaking through difficulties in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance under the great banner of Songun.
					
					 The idea that victory in building a great, prosperous and powerful nation lies in military forces is represented in the poster "Guarantee the building of a powerful nation with arms!"  It conveys the call of the joint editorial to firmly guarantee the building of a prosperous socialist country with arms by increasing the might of Songun in every way.
					
					 "Toward independence, democracy and reunification!" shows well the desire of the Korean people for national reunification by portraying the pivotal figure holding high the slogan of independence, democracy and reunification in the center against the background of a column of parade with placards calling for the honest implementation of the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration in accordance with the idea of "by our nation itself."
					
					  "Officials, think and think!" portrays an official who thinks deeply and makes efforts to create new things against the backdrop of modern factories under construction. It calls upon officials to march vigorously at the head of the movement for a new revolutionary upsurge with full preparedness.
					
					  Other posters include "Let us all turn out in the fulfillment of the tasks laid down in the joint editorial!", "Effect a new revolutionary upsurge on all fronts in the spirit of Kangson!", "Glorify this year as a year of general offensive for national prosperity!", "Carry forward unswervingly the anti-Japanese revolutionary tradition!" and "Bring a new turn in strengthening the militia this year marking the 50th anniversary of the founding of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards!".

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Watchwords of "No Nukes, Opening and 3,000 Dollars" Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Watchwords of "No Nukes, Opening and 3,000 Dollars" Flailed
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak appointed the guy who authored the sycophantic and anti-reunification scenario for confrontation as minister of "Unification" while talking nonsense about "adherence to principle" and "change of attitude," far from throwing away the watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars." This is a clear testimony to the fact that the traitor has not yet woken up from the nightmare of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 What the Lee group has done under the watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" is nothing but having pushed the inter-Korean relations to the worst crisis, totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. The above-said watchwords are, in a nutshell, a sycophantic and treacherous theory calling for doing harm to fellow countrymen through nexus with outsiders for aggression and a version of a scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The process of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula involves the whole of Korea and the assertion that the north should dismantle its nukes first can never be tolerated. 
					
					 This notwithstanding, the Lee group put the north's "dismantlement of its nuclear weapons" as a precondition for improving the inter-Korean relations. The true aim sought by the group through this is to realize its criminal wild ambition at any cost in reliance upon foreign forces.
					
					 The Lee group's persistent insistence on the above-said watchwords would only further deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and escalate confrontation in political and military fields. 
					
					 It is quite natural for all Koreans to curse the Lee group for having pursued such anti-DPRK confrontational policy as driving the inter-Korean relations to collapse and to the brink of war and demand the group roll back it. 
					
					 The north-south relations related to the future destiny of the nation can never become a plaything of the group of traitors and those swimming against the trend of the times can never escape a miserable end.

articles.title: Japan's Hostile Campaign against DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
Japan's Hostile Campaign against DPRK Blasted
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) - According to recent German press reports, Japanese banks are apt to ask any person coming to deposit money "if it is the money from north Korea." Money can be deposited only when there is the answer that "it is not the money from north Korea." Japanese are required to answer a similar question when they wish to draw their money from banks.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This ridiculous practice hardly imaginable in any other countries of the world is an expression of the Japanese militarists' reckless hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					
					 This undisguised hysteric practice dates back to the period of the ultra-right Abe regime. What the Japanese reactionaries seek through this is a criminal intention to stir up bitterness towards the DPRK among Japanese by convincing them that it is to blame for any inconvenience in their life and thus put their militaristic policy and policy for staging a comeback to Korea into practice. 
					
					 Japan is still disturbed by this despicable political charade launched by the right-wing conservative group, an indication that the hostile policy toward the DPRK has reached to an extreme phase. 
					
					 The descendents of Samurais are now working with bloodshot eyes to repeat the Japanese imperialists' history of unprecedented aggression and colonial rule over Korea. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are making desperate efforts to realize their scenario for staging a comeback to Korea, prompted by their the viewpoint that Japan can be prosperous only when it is put under Japan's control and it is fated to go to ruin when it abandons the above-said scenario.  
					
					 Should the Japanese militarists mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK to seize it, its army and people will mete out a stern judgment to them and give vent to their deep-rooted grudge against them. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to bear in mind that they will be hit hard for frantically pursuing such hostile policy toward the DPRK as now and cogitate about the ensuing consequences, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Birthday of Kim Jong Il Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Birthday of Kim Jong Il Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A celebration meeting and a lecture were held in Poland and South Africa on Jan. 17 and 22 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On display in the venues of the functions were works of Kim Jong Il, photos showing his undying exploits and publications introducing the Korean people in the efforts for building a great prosperous powerful nation.
					
					 Andrzej Kozlowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association who is chairman of the Polish preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, at the meeting said with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il who has the spirit and wisdom of Mt. Paektu, is leading the Korean people's cause of building a great prosperous powerful nation to victory while smashing every machination of the imperialists with his rare leadership ability and distinguished stratagem.
					
					 The vitality and might of the unique Songun politics have been fully demonstrated to the whole world, he said, adding: The goal of the Korean people to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung will be surely attained thanks to the outstanding Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Eddie Kekana, chairman of the Pretoria Branch of the Democratic Teachers Union of South Africa who is chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa, noted in the lecture that the DPRK is now building a great prosperous powerful nation, decisively containing the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. styling itself "the only superpower" in the world. This reality clearly proves that the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il serves as an all-powerful treasured sword definitely guaranteeing the progress and victory of the human cause of independence, he stressed.
					
					 The lecturer expressed firm belief that the DPRK's cause of socialism and the human cause of independence will surely emerge victorious thanks to Kim Jong Il, the great guardian of the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Greatest Holidays of DPRK to Be Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Greatest Holidays of DPRK to Be Marked in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A Ugandan preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 and a Congolese preparatory committee for celebrating February 16 were formed on Jan. 23 and 24.
					 Kirunda Kivejinja, third vice-prime minister and minister of Information and National Guidance of Uganda, was elected chairman of the Ugandan preparatory committee.
					
					 Alphonse Gonza, member of the Political Bureau of the Congolese Party of Labour who is secretary of the party, was elected honorary chairman of the Congolese preparatory committee and Louis Andregoma, chairman of the Congolese National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Leon Nzokene, general secretary of the Congolese Socialist Party, and Vital Balla, chairman of the Congolese Association for Friendship among Peoples, co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The Ugandan preparatory committee discussed on a plan of events to be held on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the February holiday.
					
					 The Congolese preparatory committee decided to widely introduce the immortal Juche idea and the original Songun politics and organize colorful political and cultural functions on the occasion of the February holiday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona subunidad de la Unidad No. 131 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona subunidad de la Unidad No. 131 del EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono una subunidad de la Unidad No. 131 del EPC que ostenta el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					  Tras cerciorarse en la sala de leccion militar del estado de entrenamiento en la unidad, vio ejercicios de los militares.
					
					  Satisfecho de que todos los militares crecieron como aguerridos combatientes preparados firmemente en lo ideo-politico y en lo tecnico-militar y capaces de destruir de un solo golpe cualquier invasion sorpresiva de los enemigos y defender firmemente la patria socialista, presento las tareas para incrementar la combatividad de la unidad.
					
					 Dijo que el EPC, heredero de las brillantes tradiciones de la lucha armada antijaponesa, se ha fortalecido como invencibles filas revolucionarias, que defienden a costa de la vida al partido y al lider y luchan por la causa del partido y la socialista ofrendando sin vacilacion hasta la vida.
					
					 Continuo que contar con este gran ejercito mas poderoso deviene un gran orgullo de nuestro partido y pueblo.
					
					  Al recorrer varios lugares de la subunidad, atendio cordialmente la vida de los militares.
					
					  Dispenso grandes benevolencias a los militares averiguando en detalles todas las condiciones de vida de los soldados desde el uso de videos y publicaciones hasta la temperatura del dormitorio, la vida cultural y las faenas para el autoabastecimiento.
					
					  Al recibir el parte de que gracias a la normalizacion de la operacion de una granja de cerdos, se benefician mucho las subunidades adscritas a la Unidad No. 131, se puso muy contento y enfatizo que todas las unidades deben seguir prestando profunda atencion a la intendencia.
					
					  Elogio a los oficiales que se esfuerzan con teson por dar a los soldados una vida alimentaria mas rica.
					
					  El Dirigente se fotografio junto a los militares de la subunidad.
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta ocasion los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y otros miembros directivos del ejercito.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Central Hidroelectrica No. 1 de Ryesonggang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Central Hidroelectrica No. 1 de Ryesonggang
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud No. 1 de Ryesonggang, nuevamente construida e inaugurada en octubre del ano pasado.
					  Sobre todo, el Dirigente se entero en detalles del estado de construccion y generacion electrica contemplando el panorama de la central desde un mirador.
					
					  En este lugar, donde hasta hace unos anos, reinaba el ruidoso sonido de la corriente de las aguas del rio Ryesong, se levanto hoy esta magna central hidroelectrica que sorprende al mundo, dijo y subrayo que este cambio maravilloso demuestra patentemente el poderio de la inagotable potencia espiritual y creadora del pueblo coreano armado firmemente con la idea Juche.
					
					  Esta central fue construida idealmente conforme a la demanda tecnologica en todo desde el diseno hasta la ejecucion de la obra, senalo y asevero que ella es excelente y orgullosa creacion que tiene todos los aspectos del nuevo siglo.
					
					  Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la central, recorrio la sala de generadores y la de distribucion electrica.
					
					Destacando que la patria prospera gracias al espiritu de lucha de materializacion a ultranza del pueblo coreano, que traslada el monte y rellena el mar de un tiron si lo demanda el partido, y al poderio de la unidad monolitica mas poderosa que cualquier arma, afirmo que contando con esta inagotable potencia espiritual, colocaremos sin falta la bandera roja de la victoria en la cima de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Diciendo que los constructores deben terminar con anticipacion lo restante de la obra, incluyendo la central No. 2, al seguir dando acicates con aquel impetu con que edificaron en un corto tiempo la central No. 1., presento las tareas y remedios para este fin.
					
					Luego, enumero las tareas para incrementar la produccion electrica en el pais.
					
					En nuestro pais, donde abundan recursos fluviales, el mejor atajo para cubrir satisfactoriamente la creciente demanda sobre la electricidad es construir en gran medida las centrales hidroelectricas, enseno y resalto la necesidad de prestar primordial atencion al desarrollo de la generacion hidroelectrica.
					
					Aunque es muy dificil la obra de la central hidroelectrica, una vez construida, ella sera un patrimonio eterno y resultara muy economica porque requiere pocos gastos y mano de obra en su administracion, senalo.
					
					En los ultimos anos, se construyeron en el ejercito y la sociedad numerosas centrales de mediano y pequeno tamanos que aportan ya grandes beneficios, senalo y agrego que se debe seguir materializando estrictamente la orientacion del partido de impulsar la construccion de las centrales de gran tamano al paralelo de la obra de las otras de mediano y pequeno tamanos.
					
					Puesto que en virtud de la orientacion del PTC de combinar la energia hidroelectrica con la termoelectrica, fueron construidas muchas centrales termoelectricas de gran potencia en todas partes del pais, es preciso hacerlas funcionar a toda capacidad, apunto y continuo que para este fin, hace falta realizar de manera planificada la reparacion y el mantenimiento y tomar estrictas medidas de suministro del carbon.
					
					Ahora, cuando estamos al borde de la gran potencia prospera, nuestro ejercito y pueblo entraron en la ofensiva final con el optimismo del triunfo y extraordinaria combatividad, dijo.
					
					Encomendo a todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo que adelanten cuanto antes el dia de la victoria de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera al registrar un gran auge en todos los frentes levantandose como gigantes.
					
					El Dirigente fue acompanado por el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, Choe Ryong Hae, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek, y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il elegido como candidato al diputado a XII legislatura de APS
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il elegido como candidato al diputado a XII legislatura de APS
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, fue elegido como candidato al diputado a la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC en el colegio electoral de la circunscripcion No. 333 que tuvo lugar la vispera en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Jo Myong Rok, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Kim Kyok Sik, y otros cuadros directivos del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del ministro de las FAP, Kim Il Chol.
					
					En los orgullosos anales de la RPDC estan grabadas las imborrables hazanas del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il, quien defendio resueltamente y profundizo la autoctona idea y linea del Presidente Kim Il Sung sobre la construccion del Estado y manifesto a todo el mundo la dignidad y el gallardo aspecto de la RPDC practicando la original politica de Songun (priorizacion militar), destaco el informante.
					
					Acto seguido, en representacion del ferviente deseo de todos los electores, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, propuso solemnemente elegir al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como candidato al diputado a la APS de la circunscripcion No. 333.
					
					Todos los electores militares expresaron entero apoyo y aprobacion a la proposicion del informante. 
					
					El primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Kim Jong Gak, y otros oradores dieron total apoyo y aprobacion a la propuesta del informante y senalaron que elegir al Comandante Supremo como candidato al diputado a la APS significa el privilegio mas grande para los oficiales y soldados del EPC y la maxima gloria para la nacion de Kim Il Sung.
					
					Expusieron la determinacion de defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion encabezada por el Dirigente y de manifestar sin reservas el poderio de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias en la defensa de la patria y la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					En el colegio electoral quedo declarado con solemnidad que el Dirigente fue elegido como candidato al diputado a la APS de la circunscripcion No. 333 para las elecciones de diputados a la XII legislatura de la APS segun el unanime deseo y absoluta aprobacion de todos los electores.

articles.title: Portavoz del EMG vuelve a exponer la posicion de principios del EPC
articles.content:
Portavoz del EMG vuelve a exponer la posicion de principios del EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ATCC) -- La banda de Lee Myung Bak ni tiene cara ni calificacion siquiera para hablar del problema nuclear de alguien.
					Dijo asi el portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea en la entrevista concedida el dia 2 con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea con motivo de que en estos dias la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea se porta mal en cuanto al problema de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Ya expusimos nuestra inconmovible posicion de no renunciar a las armas nucleares aunque pasen cien anos antes de que sean eliminadas radicalmente la politica hostil de Estados Unidos y su amenaza nuclear a la RPDC, afirma el portavoz.
					
					  Citando datos, el revelo que la banda de Lee esta censurando atrevidamente tal posicion de principios de la RPDC, y continuo:
					
					  Todo esto demuestra claramente la siniestra intencion antinacional de la banda del traidor Lee que se suma a ciegas a la politica hostil y la campana de amenaza nuclear de su amo norteamericano contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sin saber correctamente la esencia y la magnitud de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Desde el principio, el problema nuclear de esta peninsula fue surgido y ampliado por los titeres surcoreanos que siguiendo la politica nuclear de EE.UU. consistente en "no negar ni reconocer", introdujeron en secreto numerosas bombas nucleares en el Sur de Corea y desplegaron o fijaron hasta los medios ofensivos para usarlas.
					
					 Sin embargo, al encubrir sus crimenes antinacionales, esta horda de traidores censura atrevidamente de una manera u otra nuestra justa insistencia y demanda en lo tocante al problema nuclear.
					
					 Manifiesto abajo la posicion de principios del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					La camarilla del traidor Lee debe saber bien que la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana no sera jamas la "cancelacion nuclear del Norte" para eliminar nuestras armas nucleares.
					
					La "cancelacion nuclear del Norte" no sera realizada nunca antes de que se lleve a efecto la "cancelacion nuclear del Sur" encaminada a erradicar la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					La banda del traidor Lee no debe olvidar que la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana se realizara mediante una consecuente verificacion sobre toda la extension peninsular.
					
					Si son verdaderas las palabras de EE.UU. y la camarilla de Lee de que no existen armas nucleares en suelo surcoreano y fue eliminada la amenaza nuclear a la RPDC, no habria ningun motivo de inaceptar la demanda sobre la verificacion nuclear en todo el territorio surcoreano.
					
					  La banda de Lee Myung Bak debe saber bien que en las actuales condiciones de que persisten las relaciones hostiles, el unico remedio para cancelar las armas nucleares esta en el desarme nuclear simultaneo por las partes interesadas que tienen armamentos de este tipo.
					
					  Hoy dia, nadie sabe cuando dara lugar a la guerra nuclear la politica hostil a la RPDC que esa banda practica persistentemente dando espaldas al fin del actual estado de armisticio que no es la guerra ni la paz.
					
					 En estas circunstancias, las pretensiones de eliminar unilateralmente las armas nucleares de la contraparte beligerante resultan el climax del cinismo.
					
					  La camarilla del traidor Lee, que no tiene cara ni calificacion, debe dejar de actuar como lacayo virulento en el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana para adular a su amo norteamericano.
					
					 Mientras prosiguen los alborotos de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU. en el Sur de Corea y su contorno y la campana conflictiva con la RPDC de la banda de Lee Myung Bak, que se suman a dichos alborotos, nuestras armas nucleares para salvar a la nacion y defender el pais seguiran cumpliendo hasta el final su mision y deber especiales de precioso medio omnipotente que tiene en comun nuestra nacion.
